00199 #define NXT_ASSERT_SENSOR_PORT(port) NSAssert1( port <= kNXTSensor4, @"invalid sensor port: %d", port);
00200 #define NXT_ASSERT_MOTOR_PORT(port)  NSAssert1( port <= kNXTMotorC || port == kNXTMotorAll, @"invalid servo port: %d", port);
